data.title: extras: Official Avant Window Navigator Extras repository
data.meta_description: Official Avant Window Navigator Extras repository. Contribute to p12tic/awn-extras development by creating an account on GitHub.
data.text: Hi! Those looking for Dbus-based plugins for their favourite application, please go to the awn-plugins folder. Applets are under awn-applets. awn-core-applets are those that ship alongside awn, such as the trash, separator etc. Each applet has its own folder, and you just need to enter it and do the usual: ./autogen.sh && make && sudo make install unless otherwise stated :-)! --Neil
